Classifier Chains method. See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. In Proc. of 20th European Conference on Machine Learning (ECML 2009). Bled, Slovenia, September 2009. See: Jesse Read, Bernhard Pfahringer, Geoff Holmes, Eibe Frank. Classifier Chains for Multi-label Classification. Machine Learning Journal. Springer. 2011.
